original_title: UFC on Fox 14: Gustafsson vs. Johnson
overview: UFC on Fox 14: Gustafsson vs. Johnson was a mixed martial arts event held on January 24, 2015 at the Tele2 Arena in Stockholm, Sweden. The event was headlined by a light heavyweight bout between Alexander Gustafsson and Anthony Johnson. The UFC subsequently announced that the winner of the main event will receive a title shot against UFC Light Heavyweight champion Jon Jones.
tagline: The Time Is Now To Stake Their Claim
title: UFC on Fox 14: Gustafsson vs. Johnson
